law.catch_line: Report required -- Contents -- Compliance with KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

text.section:
Within sixty (60) days after the close of each fiscal year the board shall make a written report to the Department for Libraries and Archives. A copy of this report shall be filed with the county clerk of each county within the district. The report shall contain:
A statement of the property acquired by devise, bequest, purchase, gift or otherwise during the fiscal year;
A statement of the character of library service furnished to the district during the fiscal year; and
Any other statistics or information requested by the Department for Libraries and Archives.
The board shall comply with the provisions of KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 60, effective March 21, 2013. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 13, effective June 16, 1960.
